alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Marshall; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 7:27AM EDT until July 19 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CALLOWAY...SOUTHEASTERN MARSHALL AND SOUTHWESTERN TRIGG COUNTIES... At 626 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Canton to Wranglers Campground to 7 miles west of Turkey Bay, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 625 AM, a tree was reported down across Hwy 68 in Trigg County. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Energy Lake Campground, Turkey Bay, Golden Pond Visitors Center, Wranglers Campground, Land Between The Lakes Area, Canton and Aurora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
